# Introduction

Data Source - Rohit Kulkarni (2017), News Headlines of India 2001-2018 [CSV data file], doi:10.7910/DVN/J7BYRX, Retrieved from: [https://www.kaggle.com/therohk/india-headlines-news-dataset]

# Analysis

```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidytext)
library(lubridate)
```

```{r}
news <- read_csv("~/Downloads/india-news-headlines.csv",
                 col_types = cols(publish_date = col_character()))
news %>% 
  mutate(publish_date = ymd(publish_date)) -> news
```

```{r}
news %>% 
  count(headline_category, sort = TRUE)
```

```{r}
news %>% 
  filter(headline_category == "city.indore")
```
